paragraphs: Fashion month might be over, but its glamorous and high-octane Instagrams live on. This past week, attendees at Paris Fashion Week were thriving, well-dressed, and showing the world their megawatt garb. In Paris, model-dancer Alton Mason went for a full optic white outfit, with a leather biker jacket, skinny jeans, and a pair of Tabi boots. His background of choice? Mason chose to recline in a plush bed, making for a perfectly comfy-chic look. Another bold moment? Renata Litvinova, one of Russia’s most famous actresses (and a huge fan of Demna Gvasalia) walking the Balenciaga parliament-inspired runway. Post-show, Litvinova posed on a royal blue chair in her layered lace semi-sheer black dress—look 85, specifically— and the result was nothing short of regal.

But, of course, not all on the ‘gram was fashion month-centric. Beloved rockstar Lenny Kravitz touched down in Tokyo in his signature get-up: A rockstar-approved denim tuxedo look. For his shining accessories? He opted for his standard layered necklaces, naked chest, and a beaming smile. And while Lenny was at work, the popstar Halsey took some time off to relax, heading to Santorini to celebrate her 25th birthday and posing in a white tube top and a low-slung beige skirt. To leave you with some shine for your upcoming week, take a glance at Billie Eilish. The singer went retro with a velvet black mock neck and seven huge gold chains—we’d like to call this image “blindingly cool.”
Here, see the best fashion Instagrams of the week.
summary:

The singer went retro with a velvet black mock neck and seven huge gold chains—we’d like to call this image “blindingly cool.”Here, see the best fashion Instagrams of the week.
title: The Best Fashion Instagrams of the Week: Billie Eilish, Halsey, and More
